issue.title: [Java] templates/FixValueVectors reset() method doesn't set allocationSizeInBytes correctly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1296](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1296). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`[~siddteotia]` pointed out reset() in templates/FixValueVectors.java should set:
```Java
allocationSizeInBytes = INITIAL_VALUE_ALLOCATION * ${type.width}
```

instead of:
```Java
allocationSizeInBytes = INITIAL_VALUE_ALLOCATION
```
